root.name: Firepower 2000
root.description: The game supports 1 to 2 players, whereby Player One would control the Helicopter, whilst Player Two could control the Jeep, or vice versa.The Helicopter is capable of flying over obstacles so by picking the Jeep you had a large disadvantage and could often get stuck on a building and subsequently die, due to the screen constantly moving upwardsIt was also released on the Sega Mega Drive under a different title; Mega Swiv, albeit with reduced quality of audio and graphics. A different level design is incorporated into the Mega Drive version, but the general premise is the same.
